text: National Cheng Kung University (NCKU; ) is a university in Taiwan. It was named after Koxinga (Wade-Giles: Cheng Ch'eng-kung). The main campus is in Tainan City. It was founded in 1931. NCKU is among the four universities of the Taiwan Comprehensive University System. ==Other websites== *Chéng Dà C Category:1931 establishments in Asia Category:20th-century establishments in Taiwan
title: National Cheng Kung University
